tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE auditing_configurations (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   configuration_name VARCHAR(50),
   database_name VARCHAR(50),
   schema_name VARCHAR(50),
   security_measure VARCHAR(100),
   financial_data_protection VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Financial_Configurations (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    database_name VARCHAR(255),
    configuration_type VARCHAR(255),
    required_security_level VARCHAR(50),
    audit_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Security_Logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    action_performed VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE auditing_configs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  database_name VARCHAR(255),
  schema_name VARCHAR(255),
  configuration VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE security_measures (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  measure_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_number VARCHAR(255),
  balance DECIMAL(10, 2),
  owner_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE security_audit_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  action VARCHAR(255),
  user_id INT
)
